languages.text: "Разумеется, это не мешает определенным господам — Каллигосу Винтерскейлу, если точнее — постоянно контролировать Футфол из тени. Если вы, новоявленный Вольный Торговец, начнете карьеру с официальной высадки и парада в свою честь, это может быть воспринято другими династиями как "новичок готовится к переделу сфер влияния".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется, это не мешает определенным господам — Каллигосу Винтерскейлу, если точнее — постоянно контролировать Футфол из тени. Если вы, новоявленный Вольный Торговец, начнете карьеру с официальной высадки и парада в свою честь, это может быть воспринято другими династиями как "новичок готовится к переделу сфер влияния".

languages.text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется, это не мешает определенным господам — Каллигосу Винтерскейлу, если точнее — постоянно контролировать Футфол из тени. Если вы, новоявленный Вольный Торговец, начнете карьеру с официальной высадки и парада в свою честь, это может быть воспринято другими династиями как "новичок готовится к переделу сфер влияния".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, it does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings. If you, a newly appeared Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honor, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

"Of course, it does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings. If you, a newly appeared Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honor, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

"Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings in Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honor, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

"Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings in Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honor, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

"Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings in Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

languages.text: «Naturalmente, eso no evita que algunas personas, concretamente Calligos Winterscale, manipulen la situación de Paso. Si, como Comerciante Independiente recién llegad{mf|o|a}, empieza su trayectoria con una llegada oficial y un desfile en su honor, las otras dinastías podrían considerarlo como un gesto de desafío a su influencia».
languages.original_text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, eso no evita que algunas personas, concretamente Calligos Winterscale, manipulen la situación de Paso. Si, como Comerciante Independiente recién llegad{mf|o|a}, empieza su trayectoria con una llegada oficial y un desfile en su honor, las otras dinastías podrían considerarlo como un gesto de desafío a su influencia».

languages.text: “当然，即便如此，其中一部分人，像卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，也会巧妙地掌控着落脚港背后的一切。如果您，一位新任行商浪人，以官方身份开始您的职业生涯的话，其他行商浪人王朝可能会认为您是在挑战他们的权威。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

traits.locale_text: “当然，即便如此，其中一部分人，像卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，也会巧妙地掌控着落脚港背后的一切。如果您，一位新任行商浪人，以官方身份开始您的职业生涯的话，其他行商浪人王朝可能会认为您是在挑战他们的权威。”

languages.text: 「もちろん、だからいってフットフォールで巧妙に糸を引いているカリゴス・ウィンタースケールのように、特定の人物を止められるわけではありません。陛下が新たな自由開拓者として公に着陸し、名誉あるパレードでその職務を開始されれば、他の王朝は自分の勢力図に切り込む新参者が現れたと考えるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、だからいってフットフォールで巧妙に糸を引いているカリゴス・ウィンタースケールのように、特定の人物を止められるわけではありません。陛下が新たな自由開拓者として公に着陸し、名誉あるパレードでその職務を開始されれば、他の王朝は自分の勢力図に切り込む新参者が現れたと考えるかもしれません」

languages.text: "Natürlich hält das bestimmte Personen, namentlich Calligos Winterzunder, nicht davon ab, in Footfall subtil die Fäden zu ziehen. Wenn Ihr als {mf|neuer Freihändler|neue Freihändlerin} Eure Karriere mit einer offiziellen Landung und einer Parade zu Euren Ehren beginnt, könnten andere Dynastien diese Geste als Angriff eines Neulings auf ihre Einflussbereiche werten."
languages.original_text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich hält das bestimmte Personen, namentlich Calligos Winterzunder, nicht davon ab, in Footfall subtil die Fäden zu ziehen. Wenn Ihr als {mf|neuer Freihändler|neue Freihändlerin} Eure Karriere mit einer offiziellen Landung und einer Parade zu Euren Ehren beginnt, könnten andere Dynastien diese Geste als Angriff eines Neulings auf ihre Einflussbereiche werten."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, cela n'empêche pas certaines personnes, à savoir Calligos Winterscale, de tirer subtilement les ficelles. Si vous, {mf|un libre-marchand nouvellement nommé|une libre-marchande nouvellement nommée}, commencez votre carrière avec un atterrissage officiel et une parade en votre honneur, les autres dynasties pourraient croire que vous cherchez à empiéter sur leurs plates-bandes. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, cela n'empêche pas certaines personnes, à savoir Calligos Winterscale, de tirer subtilement les ficelles. Si vous, {mf|un libre-marchand nouvellement nommé|une libre-marchande nouvellement nommée}, commencez votre carrière avec un atterrissage officiel et une parade en votre honneur, les autres dynasties pourraient croire que vous cherchez à empiéter sur leurs plates-bandes. »

languages.text: "Elbette bu bazı kişilerin, örneğin Calligos Winterscale'in Binliman'da ipleri gizliden gizliye elinde tutmasına engel olmaz. Yeni bir Hür Tacir olarak kariyerinize resmî bir karşılamayla ve şerefinize düzenlenen geçit töreniyle başlarsanız diğer hanedanlıklar, bu davranışı kendi nüfuz alanlarına göz dikme olarak algılayabilirler."
languages.original_text: "Of course, that does not prevent certain persons, namely Calligos Winterscale, from subtly pulling the strings on Footfall. If you, as a new Rogue Trader, start your career with an official landing and a parade in your honour, the other dynasties may see this gesture as the newcomer challenging their spheres of influence."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette bu bazı kişilerin, örneğin Calligos Winterscale'in Binliman'da olan biteni el altından etkilemesine engel olmuyor. Eğer yeni bir Hür Tacir olarak kariyerinize resmî bir karşılamayla ve onurunuza düzenlenen bir geçit töreniyle başlarsanız diğer hanedanlıklar bu davranışı kendi nüfuz alanlarına göz dikme olarak algılayabilirler."
